meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a person having both male and female physical characteristics or a combination of male and female chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The intersexual individual had features that were both typically male and female.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the intersexual condition meant having traits of both genders.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a surprise to discover the intersexual nature of the new species.
meanings.sent4: The intersexual nature of the painting blended colors in a unique and intriguing way.
meanings.sent5: The intersexual plant stood out in the garden with its mix of male and female characteristics.

meanings.definition: A person or organism having both male and female physical characteristics or a combination of male and female chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: The intersexual was proud of their ability to understand both male and female perspectives.
meanings.sent2: The intersexual in the documentary shared their experience of living with dual physical traits.
meanings.sent3: The intersexual at the party was the center of attention due to their fascinating biology.
meanings.sent4: The intersexual of the animal kingdom was a rare and remarkable creature.
meanings.sent5: The intersexual's presence in the group brought a unique blend of characteristics.
